refnamediv.refpurpose: Respond to IPv6 Node Information Queries

refsection.para: Responds to IPv6 Node Information Queries (RFC4620) from clients. Queries can be sent by various implementations of ping command.

listitem.para: Debug mode. Do not go background.
Run as another user. user can either be username or user ID.
File for process-id storage. user is required to be able to create the file.

refsection.para: ninfod was written by USAGI/WIDE Project.
